Driving Directions to Seattle

From San Francisco, California (12.5 hours, 808 miles):

Take I-80 E and I-5 N
Take exit 164A from I-5 N

From Vancouver, BC, Canada (2.5 hours, 142 miles):

Take BC-99 S and I-5 S
Take exit 165B from I-5 S

From Portland, Oregon (2.5 hours, 173 miles):

Take I-405 N and I-5 N
Take exit 164A from I-5 N

From New York City, New York (42 hours, 2,861 miles):

Take Church St, 6th Ave and I-78 W to NJ-139 W in Jersey City
Take I-80 W, I-90 W, I-94 W and I-90 W.
Take exit 2C from I-90 W
